e_id, name, sex, birthday, id_card, dept_id, job_id, create_data, job_date, work_type, source, politic, folk, native_place, phone, email, height, blood, marriage, birth_place, house, degree, diploma, school, spical, graduate_date, trial_begin, trial_end, results, dept.dept_name, job.job_name
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from emp
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
from emp left join dept on emp.dept_id=dept.d_id left join job on emp.job_id=job.j_id
order by ${orderByClause}

update emp
e_id = #{record.eId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{record.sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
birthday = #{record.birthday,jdbcType=DATE},
